product_name: SmartWool NTS Midweight Pattern Long Underwear Zip-T - Men's
long_description: The men's SmartWool NTS Midweight Pattern long underwear Zip-T offers next-to-skin warmth and great moisture management in a fun striped design. The formfitting SmartWool Midweight Pattern Zip-T is made of merino wool to wick moisture and keep you comfortable in cold weather. 10 in. front zipper ventilates on demand; raised collar keeps your neck warm in the cold. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Flatlock stitching eliminates abrasion, increases comfort and enhances fit by reducing bulky seams. Shoulder panels eliminate top shoulder seams, reduce chafing and optimize comfort under pack straps. The men's SmartWool NTS Midweight Pattern long underwear Zip-T is machine washable and dryable, does not itch and will not shrink.
